newsitem.headline: GSD on Google Plus
newsitem.text: GocalSD has expanded its social media blogging to Google Plus to reach out to a more expanded focus group. You can join up by liking our page. https://plus.google.com/communities/108567249160916172770

newsitem.headline: GSD on Facebook
newsitem.text: GocalSD has expanded its social media blogging to Facebook to reach out to a more expanded focus group. You can join up by liking our page. https://www.facebook.com/Gocalsd

newsitem.headline: Enjoy my work?
newsitem.text: Please take the time to rate GSD Mobile on Google Play and share it with friends that may like my work. Im expanding my horizons in 2017 to increase popularity, revenue and knowledge. Bigger and better things are in the horizon.

newsitem.headline: Game with the dev!
newsitem.text: Hit me up on PS4 Dracos_Aura or Windows10 Live GT Dracos Aura
